alert.note: Alert for Iberia; St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 1:56PM CDT until September 08 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Iberia Parish in south central Louisiana... St. Mary Parish in south central Louisiana... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 155 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ridge to 8 miles northwest of Bayou Sorrel, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Morgan City, Franklin, Patterson, Jeanerette, Berwick, Burns Point, Bayou Vista, Cypremort Point, Avery Island, Baldwin, Loreauville, Ellerslie, Patterson Memorial Airport, Lydia, Acadiana Regional Airport, Sorrel, Amelia, Coteau, and Glencoe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
